page.title: 02NURSING HOMES
page.content:
There are two nursing homes in Burnham-on-Sea, and a great many old people's homes. Old people like to live here because it is close to the beach and there is easy walking.
The home we visited had 50 old people living in it. There is a resident cat called Miffy, although the people are not allowed to have any pets except caged birds.
They often go for walks or on day trips, and come and go during the day as they wish.
Special diets are sometimes required, and the food is attractive and nourishing. There is a comfortable lounge with a colour television and a piano for sing-songs. The residents are very happy there.
